trans-unit.source: Verifies a Digital Signature Algorithm (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) PKCS#1 v1.5 signature.
trans-unit.target: Verifica um algoritmo de Assinatura Digital (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) PKCS n. º&1; v&1;.5 assinatura.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter"></xref> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter"> </xref> classe com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: The instance of Digital Signature Algorithm (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) that holds the key.
trans-unit.target: A instância do algoritmo de Assinatura Digital (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) que contém a chave.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the hash algorithm for the Digital Signature Algorithm (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) signature deformatter.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o algoritmo de hash para o algoritmo de Assinatura Digital (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) desformatador de assinatura assimétrico.

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm to use for the signature deformatter.
trans-unit.target: O nome do algoritmo hash a utilizar para o desformatador de assinatura assimétrico.

trans-unit.source: The strName parameter does not map to the hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: O strName parâmetro não é mapeado para o algoritmo hash.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the key to be used for the Digital Signature Algorithm (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) signature deformatter.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a chave a ser utilizada para o algoritmo de Assinatura Digital (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) desformatador de assinatura assimétrico.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> that holds the key.
trans-unit.target: A instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"> </xref> que contém a chave.

trans-unit.source: Verifies the Digital Signature Algorithm (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) signature on the data.
trans-unit.target: Verifica o algoritmo de Assinatura Digital (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) assinatura nos dados.

trans-unit.source: The signature to be verified for `rgbHash`.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the signature is valid for the data; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a assinatura é válida para os dados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
A chave DSA está em falta.
